top.title: BUTTER HOODIE
top.subtitle: Organic Cotton Hoodie
top.body:
### Product Details
This hoodie is crafted from 100% organic cotton with a buttery soft handfeel. Perfect for everyday wear, it features a relaxed fit and classic cut, making it a wardrobe staple.

### Design elements
Fit: Relaxed fit
Hem: Straight

### About the Fabric
**FABRIC**: Organic Cotton (GOTS certified)
A soft, breathable knit that's responsibly sourced to minimize environmental impact.
